DOR closures in July

The Department of Revenue will be closed on the following dates: July 2, 3, 10, 17, and 24, 2020.  Learn more.

Voluntary disclosure program temporarily expanded

The Department of Revenue is temporarily expanding the eligibility criteria for the Voluntary Disclosure Agreement (VDA) Program, effective July 15, 2020 through Nov. 30, 2020. Read More
